channel.title: Dreamscape Records
channel.description: Dreamscape Records is an independent record label founded with the focus of exploring the vast diversity that is electronic music and searching for music makers that have potential.

item.title: Behind the Scenes : The New Dreamscape Website
item.description: Here at Dreamscape, we believe technology plays a critical role in how we connect artists and fans, so we are proud to present to you, the new Dreamscape Website.
